sentences.sentence: This will greatly catalyze exoplanet research.
sentences.translation: 这将极大促进地外星系研究。

sentences.sentence: I want to catalyze the use of our ideas in cities all across Africa.
sentences.translation: 我想加速我们的想法在整个非洲的使用。

sentences.sentence: Taking these steps focuses your energy and intention and will catalyze significant change.
sentences.translation: 采用这些步骤集中您的精力和意图，并且将促进重要的变更。
